meanings.definition: To not bill or charge for goods or services provided.
meanings.sent1: I will unvoice the extra hours I worked last week.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to unvoice the shipping fees for the loyal customers.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to unvoice the cost of the audience's tickets.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unvoiced the gratitude she felt for the unexpected favor.
meanings.sent5: The decision to unvoice the repair charges made the customers very happy.

meanings.definition: A document that does not contain a bill or charge for goods or services.
meanings.sent1: Please make sure the unvoice is attached to the shipment.
meanings.sent2: The unvoice was missing from the package, causing confusion for the recipient.
meanings.sent3: The unvoice in the file was accidentally deleted, causing a delay in processing.
meanings.sent4: The unvoice acted as a receipt for the goods received without any charges.
meanings.sent5: The unvoice was a pleasant surprise for the customer, showing the service was complimentary.
